page.title: 07PEOPLE IN BURNT HEATH
page.content: We surveyed 30{houses}in our area.People have lived in their homes from 3 months to nearly 60 years.Many {commute}to{Colchester or London}and a few work at home,6 people are retired, 15 people have 2 children,6 people have 1 child and 4 people have none.Others have 3,4 or 5 children Most house occupiers are in the 18_60 year age groups and many had lived in the{locality}before moving to their present houses. Our survey started at the General Store and we ended at Ardleigh Road.In Burnt Heath there is a{public house called the Cross Inn, 1 shop and a post office, but there are no other {amenities,}they are not on mains drainage and there is no gas. Residents have the usual domestic pets.
